verses.verse: Now these <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of David <WH1732> who <WH834> were born <WH3205> to him in Hebron: <WH2275> the first-born [was] Amnon, <WH550> by Ahinoam <WH293> the Jezreelitess; <WH3159> the second <WH8145> [was] Daniel, <WH1840> by Abigail <WH26> the Carmelitess; <WH3762>

the third <WH7992> [was] Absalom <WH53> the son <WH1121> of Maacah, <WH4601> the daughter <WH1323> of Talmai <WH8526> king <WH4428> of Geshur; <WH1650> the fourth <WH7243> [was] Adonijah <WH138> the son <WH1121> of Haggith; <WH2294>
the fifth <WH2549> [was] Shephatiah, <WH8203> by Abital; <WH37> the sixth <WH8345> [was] Ithream, <WH3507> by his wife <WH802> Eglah. <WH5698>

Six <WH8337> were born <WH3205> to him in Hebron, <WH2275> and there <WH8033> he reigned <WH4427> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> and six <WH8337> months. <WH2320> And in Jerusalem <WH3389> he reigned <WH4427> thirty-three years. <WH8141>

And these <WH428> were born <WH3205> to him in Jerusalem: <WH3389> Shimea, <WH8092> Shobab, <WH7727> Nathan, <WH5416> and Solomon, <WH8010> four, <WH702> by Bath-shua the daughter <WH1323> of Ammiel; <WH5988>
and Ibhar, <WH2984> Elishama, <WH476> Eliphelet, <WH467>
Nogah, <WH5052> Nepheg, <WH5298> and Japhia, <WH3309>
Elishama, <WH476> Eliada, <WH450> and Eliphelet, <WH467> nine. <WH8672>
All <WH3605> [these were] the sons <WH1121> of David, <WH1732> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the sons <WH1121> of the concubines; <WH6370> and Tamar <WH8559> [was] their sister. <WH269>
Now Solomon's son <WH1121> [was] Rehoboam, <WH7346> Abijah <WH29> [was] his son, <WH1121> Asa <WH609> his son, <WH1121> Jehoshaphat <WH3092> his son, <WH1121>
Joram <WH3141> his son, <WH1121> Ahaziah <WH274> his son, <WH1121> Joash <WH3060> his son, <WH1121>
Amaziah <WH558> his son, <WH1121> Azariah <WH5838> his son, <WH1121> Jotham <WH3147> his son, <WH1121>
Ahaz <WH271> his son, <WH1121> Hezekiah <WH2396> his son, <WH1121> Manasseh <WH4519> his son, <WH1121>
Amon <WH526> his son, <WH1121> Josiah <WH2977> his son. <WH1121>

And the sons <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> [were] Johanan <WH3076> the first-born, and the second <WH8145> [was] Jehoiakim, <WH3079> the third <WH7992> Zedekiah, <WH6667> the fourth <WH7243> Shallum. <WH7967>
And the sons <WH1121> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> [were] Jeconiah <WH3204> his son, <WH1121> Zedekiah <WH6667> his son. <WH1121>
And the sons <WH1121> of Jeconiah, <WH3204> the prisoner, <WH616> [were] Shealtiel <WH7597> his son, <WH1121>
and Malchiram, <WH4443> Pedaiah, <WH6305> Shenazzar, <WH8137> Jekamiah, <WH3359> Hoshama, <WH1953> and Nedabiah. <WH5072>

And the sons <WH1121> of Pedaiah <WH6305> [were] Zerubbabel <WH2216> and Shimei. <WH8096> And the sons <WH1121> of Zerubbabel <WH2216> [were] Meshullam <WH4918> and Hananiah, <WH2608> and Shelomith <WH9609> [was] their sister; <WH269>
and Hashubah, <WH2807> Ohel, <WH169> Berechiah, <WH1296> Hasadiah, <WH2619> and Jushab-hesed, five. <WH2568>

And the sons <WH1121> of Hananiah <WH2608> [were] Pelatiah <WH6410> and Jeshaiah, <WH3470> the sons <WH1121> of Rephaiah, <WH7509> the sons <WH1121> of Arnan, <WH770> the sons <WH1121> of Obadiah, <WH5662> the sons <WH1121> of Shecaniah. <WH7935>

And the son <WH1121> of Shecaniah <WH7935> [was] Shemaiah, <WH8098> and the sons <WH1121> of Shemaiah <WH8098> [were] Hattush, <WH2407> Igal, <WH3008> Bariah, <WH1282> Neariah, <WH5294> and Shaphat, <WH8202> six. <WH8337>
And the sons <WH1121> of Neariah <WH5294> [were] Elioenai, <WH454> Hizkiah, <WH2396> and Azrikam, <WH5840> three. <WH7969>
And the sons <WH1121> of Elioenai <WH454> [were] Hodaviah, <WH1939> Eliashib, <WH475> Pelaiah, <WH6411> Akkub, <WH6126> Johanan, <WH3076> Delaiah, <WH1806> and Anani, <WH6054> seven. <WH7651>
